author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KIKO STILL A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE AND COULD BECOME A LITTLE STRONGER... ...INTEREST IN THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS SHOULD MONITOR KIKO'S PROGRESS...
summary: ...KIKO STILL A CATEGORY FOUR HURRICANE AND COULD BECOME A LITTLE STRONGER... ...INTEREST IN THE HAWAIIAN ISLANDS SHOULD MONITOR KIKO'S PROGRESS... As of 11:00 AM HST Thu Sep 04 the center of Kiko was located near 13.9, -134.6 with movement W at 9 mph. The minimum central pressure was 951 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 130 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Kiko (EP1/EP112025)
